alert.note: Alert for Dodge; Laurens; Montgomery; Toombs; Wheeler (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 06 at 6:07PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Laurens, northwestern Toombs, central Dodge, Wheeler and Montgomery Counties through 645 PM EDT... At 607 PM EDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated strong winds ahead of a line of thunderstorms along a line extending from Plainfield to near Cedar Grove to near Higgston, and moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind preceding rain or lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds will occur before any rain or lightning. Do not wait for the sound of thunder before taking cover. Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Eastman, Alamo, Mount Vernon, Vidalia, Glenwood, Ailey, Higgston, Tarrytown, Center, Plainfield, Landsburg, Cedar Grove, Kibbee, and Jay Bird Springs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for central and east central Georgia.
